official_title: To exclude from an individual's estate in bankruptcy any interest in certain qualified pension plans under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
short_title: Personal Bankruptcy Pension Protection Act of 1991

summary.text: Personal Bankruptcy Pension Protection Act of 1991 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to exclude from an individual's estate in bankruptcy any interest in certain qualified nonassignable pension plans under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: Personal Bankruptcy Pension Protection Act of 1991
To exclude from an individual's estate in bankruptcy any interest in certain qualified pension plans under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986.
